question: When vice president acts as the president , which among the following is/ are true?
option1: He/ She remains the chairman of the Rajya Sabha and performs the duties of the chairman of Rajya Sabha
option2: He/ She ceases to be the chairman of Rajya Sabha
option3: Lok Sabha Speaker performs the duty of the chairman of the Rajya Sabha
answer: He/ She ceases to be the chairman of Rajya Sabha
explanation: When vice president acts as the president, he ceases to be the chairman of Rajya Sabha.
